casebody.data:
No. 09-784. Janice C. Amara, et al., Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioners v. CIGNA Corporation, et al. 559 U.S. 990, 130 S. Ct. 1754,

176 L. Ed. 2d 210,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2261. March 8, 2010.

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
